What is Newton's First Law?
Answer: An object at rest will stay at rest and an object in motion will stay in motion with a constant velocity| unless acted upon by an external force.
Distractor1: The force applied to an object is equal to the object's mass times its acceleration.
Distractor2: For every action| there is an equal and opposite reaction.
